A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Rian Johnson drops the ball\, and basically kills Star Wars in one fell swoop. From the disrespect to characters people have loved for forty years   to the implausable scenes to the snarky progressive/left leaning undertones\, TLJ accomplishes an impressive feat....that being that I don't care about Star Wars anymore and that I won't be viewing Episode IX.

Thank you Rian Johnson for ruining a movie. Hopefully your position for the upcoming trilogy is replaced and reconsidered\, and that JJ can reboot Star Wars properly. 

Ball dropped\, and opportunity wasted.
